my.select: select *,if(ExtraGlad='1','','') ExtraGlad from ft_agreements f where UserID1='$auth->user;' and StatusID=0 limit 0,1

battles.sql: select f.*,concat('',u.Login,'') Login, concat(LimitGlad,' (',f.GladCount,')') LimitGlad, concat(LimitSkl,' (',f.GladSkl,')') LimitSkl, if(UserID2 is not null,concat('',concat('','» ',u2.Login,''),''), if(UserID1='$auth->user;', '',concat('','вызвать »',''))) as Check1, concat(round((unix_timestamp()-f.Date)/60),' мин.') Min, if(ExtraGlad='1','','') ExtraGlad from ft_agreements f join ut_users u on f.UserID1=u.UserID left outer join ut_users u2 on f.UserID2=u2.UserID where TypeID='$typeid;' and StatusID=0 order by Date desc
